bill.summary:
Hospital Opioid Solutions Toolkit Act of 2018 or the HOST Act of 2018
This bill requires the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services to publish guidance for hospitals on pain management and opioid-use disorder prevention strategies for Medicare beneficiaries, including best practices for opioid-use disorder screening, education, and monitoring.
